Lumière Pandora's mission was simple:
Take a spoonful from the Box of Hope
and sprinkle it upon people in order to
make the world a better place for all.

To that end, she flew about the world wishing

＂Seize Lumière Pandora at once! Without her,

context.zh_cn:
来到王城的光明潘多拉问道：

來到王城的聖光潘朵拉如此問道。
國王則雙眼無神地開口：

「我想使國家變得富足，
